pages.text: Stromatoveris is a Cambrian sessile organism originally thought to be aligned with Charnia, though recent studies have challenged that notion and it is now though to be a basal ctenophore. It had a structure similar to that of other Ediacaran frondose like organisms like Charnia and Arborea.
